sen.j: 山田純夫（やまだ すみお、1937年-）は、シテ方金剛流能楽師。
sen.e: Sumio YAMADA (1937-) is a Noh actor, shite-kata (main roles) of Kongo school.
Sumio YAMADA (1937-) is a Noh actor, shite-kata (main roles) of Kongo school.
Sumio YAMADA (1937-) is a Noh actor, shite-kata (main roles) of Kongo school.

sen.j: 鹿児島県出身、1960年奥野達也に入門し、“石橋”“道成寺”“安宅”“望月”等、開曲。
sen.e: He came from Kagoshima Prefecture, became a disciple of Tatsuya OKUNO in 1960 and started to perform for the audience the programs including "Stone bridge," "Dojo-ji Temple," "Ataka" and "Mochizuki "(The Full Moon, Noh play).

He came from Kagoshima Prefecture, became a disciple of Tatsuya OKUNO in 1960 and started to perform for the audience the programs including "Stone bridge," "Dojo-ji Temple," "Ataka" and "Mochizuki "(The Full Moon, Noh play).

He came from Kagoshima Prefecture, became a disciple of Tatsuya OKUNO in 1960 and started to perform for the audience the programs including "Stone bridge," "Dojo-ji Temple," "Ataka" and "Mochizuki "(The Full Moon, Noh play).

sen.j: 1985年に純星会（アマチュアの会）設立、1992年に潤星会（プロの会）設立。
sen.e: He established Jyunsei-kai (an amateur group) in 1985 and Jyunsei-kai (a professional group) in 1992.

He established Jyunsei-kai (純星会 literally meaning a group of pure stars, which was organized as an amateur group) in 1985 and Jyunsei-kai (潤星会 literally meaning a group of abundant stars, which was organized as a professional group) in 1992.

He established Jyunsei-kai (純星会 literally meaning a group of pure stars, which was organized as an amateur group) in 1985 and Jyunsei-kai (潤星会 literally meaning a group of abundant stars, which was organized as a professional group) in 1992.
